name: Coda Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Coda Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Coda API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Coda API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: table
available_options: Control (值: control) - Controls provide a user-friendly way to input a value that can affect other parts of the doc
Formula (值: formula) - Formulas can be great for performing one-off computations
Table (值: table) - Access data of tables in documents
View (值: view) - Access data of views in documents

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: get
available_options: Delete Row (值: deleteViewRow) - Delete view row
Get Columns (值: getAllViewColumns) - Get all views columns
Get Many (值: getAll) - Get many views
Get Rows (值: getAllViewRows) - Get all views rows
Push Button (值: pushViewButton) - Push view button

docId.name: docId
docId.description: ID of the doc. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
docId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Doc Name or ID | 作用: ID of the doc. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.description: The table to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
tableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name or ID | 作用: The table to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: disableParsing (值: None) - Whether the API will not attempt to parse the data in any way

rowId.name: rowId
rowId.description: The view to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
rowId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Row Name or ID | 作用: The view to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 50

columnId.name: columnId
columnId.description: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression
columnId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Column Name or ID | 作用: Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression | (必填项)

formulaId.name: formulaId
formulaId.description: The formula to get the row from
formulaId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Formula ID | 作用: The formula to get the row from | (必填项)

controlId.name: controlId
controlId.description: The control to get the row from
controlId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Control ID | 作用: The control to get the row from | (必填项)

viewId.name: viewId
viewId.description: The view to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
viewId.natural_language_description: 参数名: View Name or ID | 作用: The view to get the row from. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression. | (必填项)

keyName.name: keyName
keyName.description: The view to get the row from
keyName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Key Name | 作用: The view to get the row from | 默认值: columns | (必填项)
